commands.name: az iot du device import
commands.summary: Import devices and modules to the Device Update instance from a linked IoT Hub.
commands.syntax:
az iot du device import --account
                        --instance
                        [--import-type {All, Devices, Modules}]
                        [--resource-group]
examples: az iot du device import -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --import-type Devices
az iot du device import -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --import-type Modules

commands.name: az iot du device list
commands.summary: List device identities contained within an instance.
examples: az iot du device list -n {account_name} -i {instance_name} --filter "groupId eq 'myDeviceGroup'"

commands.name: az iot du device show
commands.summary: Show a device identity contained within an instance.
